name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block URL: Website Blocker for Google Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to easily block distracting websites and urls for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too much time was wasted on distracting websites so this was built to block those websites.
